entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
